titles.title: A resolution congratulating and honoring Argonne National Laboratory on 75 years of scientific excellence.
A resolution congratulating and honoring Argonne National Laboratory on 75 years of scientific excellence.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: This resolution congratulates and honors Argonne National Laboratory on the 75th anniversary of its charter and wishes the laboratory continued success in helping the people of the United States unlock new scientific and technological frontiers that secure their energy future.
